# Analysis of "ðŸ’»â”‚developers" Channel Chat

## 1. Summary
The chat segment is very brief, containing only a question from Valiant about finding examples of applications that use the control.touchStick functionality for purposes other than avatar movement. Ash responds suggesting that this feature might not be fully implemented in the app runtime yet, as they couldn't find any applications currently using it. The conversation is exploratory in nature, with developers trying to understand the current state and implementation examples of the touchStick control in the platform.

## 2. FAQ
Q: Does anyone have or know of a .hyp that uses control.touchStick to control/move anything other than avatar? (asked by Valiant) A: I'm wondering if maybe it's not hooked up to the app runtime yet, because I can't find any apps that currently use it. (answered by ash)

## 3. Help Interactions
Helper: ash | Helpee: Valiant | Context: Looking for examples of control.touchStick usage beyond avatar movement | Resolution: Suggested that the feature might not be fully implemented in the runtime yet

## 4. Action Items
Technical: Investigate if control.touchStick is fully implemented in the app runtime | Description: Determine if the feature is available for developers to use in applications | Mentioned By: ash
Documentation: Document examples of control.touchStick usage beyond avatar movement | Description: Create reference implementations for developers | Mentioned By: Valiant

# Discord Chat Analysis

## 1. Summary
The chat segment is brief and contains minimal technical discussion. The main technical point mentioned is that the Hyperfy engine/world compiles .hyp files when users download .glb files with .js attached. There's a question about creating colliders on GLB files, for which a video tutorial link was shared. A user also expressed interest in migrating their project from Cryptovoxels to Hyperfy, sharing a link to their current project (distrito.museu.xyz).

## 2. FAQ
Q: How to create colliders on GLB? (asked by marlus) A: This video might help you out https://youtu.be/NWTIZv2GTgw?si=BI_1Sfc7pXIFrrRU&t=1380 (answered by Dhin)

## 3. Help Interactions
Helper: Dhin | Helpee: marlus | Context: Creating colliders on GLB files | Resolution: Shared a specific YouTube tutorial video with timestamp

## 4. Action Items
Feature: Migration from Cryptovoxels to Hyperfy | Description: User plans to migrate their cryptovoxels project (distrito.museu.xyz) to Hyperfy | Mentioned By: marlus
